source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.
source_objects.title: Project Management

items.title: Learn PMP Math EVM Concepts in 1 Hr to Dominate the PMP Exam
items.headline: Go from freaking out about the EVM math problems on the PMP exam to mastering the concepts to confidently answer them.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to confidently solve any EVM problem on the PMP exam.
You will know the difference between variances and indexes and why each are important in EVM analysis.
You will be able to tell whether a project is over or under budget and ahead or behind schedule, based on EVM calculations.

items.title: Time Slice Windows Analysis (Construction Delays): Primavera
items.headline: Construction Delay Analysis Based On The SCL Protocol & AACE MIP 3.4 (Includes Primavera P6 V17 Software Installation)
objectives_summary: This Master Course will provide you with the knowledge, expertise and practical tools to carry out a Time Slice Windows Analysis of construction programmes in order to prove extension of time claims.

items.title: Atlassian Confluence for Project Managers
items.headline: Learn Confluence Project Management and how to manage projects and programs BETTER with Atlassian Confluence
objectives_summary: How to apply Atlassian Confluence to successfully manage their projects and programs
How to create project status reports that roll up to program level status reports
How to track actions items across 1 or multiple meeting minute templates or Confluence pages

items.title: BPMN For Business Analytics A-Z™: Business Process Modeling
items.headline: Learn Business Process Modelling with over Real-World case studies
objectives_summary: Create models of any business processes with any level of complexity
Have a greater understanding of both real and corporate worlds
Practicing BPMN 2.0 as a hobby or create industry-leading models

items.title: Jira 7: For Developer, Administrator & Project Managers

objectives_summary: Learn to manage your projects effectively with Jira

Get complete administrative control over your projects
